name: Dunes 2: Sliding Santa
description:
What happened the night before Christmas ?
Not all of us know what's happening the night before Xmas...
Up there in the sky where the Santa comes from many a box of gifts are hanging sparkling, help Santa and the Reindeer to collect them all....

Try to fly as high and far as you can. The hard thing is you have to navigate carefully so that you land on the smooth path and then you have the power to go up again real high… Remember, be smooth!

Are you skillful enough to fly high and unlock the second game play? Beautiful game effects are still waiting for you…

Good luck to you all
